trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to call the action %s!
You cannot select a file, only directories!
Tis page was marked as a YAG folder. You can now start to add galleries to this folder,
No Settings for the YAG Gallery were found on the selected page.
Please select a page where the static template for YAG is included. Or include the static template of YAG on this page.
No extension configuration found for YAG.
Maybe you forgot to hit the "update" button in the extension manager. Go back to the YAG extension in the extension manager and hit the update button.
It is not posible to configure your gallery on the root page.
Please select an other page in the page module to configure your gallery.
%s instances of YAG content elements are included on pages.
Clear the cache entrys of these pages.
The page cache was successfully cleared.
It seems you are currently running YAG version %s but the YAG database is a version smaller or equal %s.
ZIP upload successfull! %s items were added to your album.
We're sorry. Multifile Uploader could not load. You must have JavaScript enabled to enjoy Multifile Uploading.
SWFUpload is loading. Please wait a moment...
SWFUpload is taking a long time to load or the load has failed. Please make sure that the Flash Plugin is enabled and that a working version of the Adobe Flash Player is installed.
We're sorry. SWFUpload could not load. You may need to install or upgrade Flash Player.
Directory import succesfull! %s items were added to your album.
The image resolution cache was successfully cleared.
The gallery with the UID %s has not been found!
There are no galleries available yet. To add your first gallery, click
There are currently no albums in your gallery. To add your first album, click
Drag and Drop albums to change sorting
The album with the UID %s has not been found!
Changes to albums have been saved!
Unfortunately the zip file importer is not available on your system. To activate it, install the zip php extension or configure the unzip binary in the install tool.
There are currently no images in your album. To add images, click
There are no images in this album.
Add jQuery Library: This option adds jQuery JS and CSS files. You can leave it, if the library is already included to the page.
Add jQuery-UI Library: This option adds jQuery-Ui JS and CSS files. You can leave it, if the library is already included to the page.
Add fancyBox Library: This option adds FancyBox JS and CSS files. You can deactivate it, if you already included a lightBox to your page.
Insert the YAG-Gallery in your page.
No albums found in the selected gallery.
No images found in the selected gallery.
No gallery selected. Please select a gallery to display assigned albums.
No album selected. Please select an album to display assigned images.
Custom Order (Sorting of galleries in backend)
Custom Order (Sorting of albums in backend)
Custom Order (Sorting of items in backend)
Page to jump to if image is clicked
Do you really want to delete this gallery?
Error while trying to delete gallery:
Sorting of galleries has been saved!
Error while trying to save sorting of galleries:
This page is not marked as a YAG folder.
Jump to a page that is marked as a YAG folder:
Mark this page as a yag sysfolder
Create yag records on this page
This is not recommended - you should rather create a sysfolder of type yag before you add yag records to this page!
Do you really want to delete this album?
Error while trying to delete album:
Sorting of albums has been saved!
Error while trying to save sorting of albums:
No gallery was submitted to add the album!
Album has been set as gallery thumb!
Set this album as gallery thumb!
Sorting of album has been changed!
Do you really want to delete this image?
Error while trying to delete image:
Sorting of images has been saved!
Error while trying to save sorting the images:
Image has been set as album thumb!
No random image could be found for selection.
You can edit the settings for gallery here.
